subjects.name: Catch Me If You Can

subjects.name: Closing In

subjects.name: Concussion
subjects.description: When you land a headshot you deal {[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.BaseDamage * 100]}% more damage and a {[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.RefundAmmoPercentChance * 100]}% chance to get your arrow back.
